title: How to Make Garlic Butter Roasted Carrots

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 425° Fahrenheit or 218° Celsius.
Grease a baking sheet with non-stick greasing spray or brush.
Wash and diagonally slice the carrots into 2-3 inch pieces.
steps.description: Set aside in a large bowl.

steps.headline: On medium heat, melt the butter on a large saucepan.
Add the garlic and saute for about 3 minutes, until golden brown.
Drizzle and toss the garlic butter over the carrots.
Pour the carrots on the baking sheet.
Bake the carrots for about 22-30 minutes, until the carrots are tender and have slightly roasted.
Season the carrots with the salt and pepper.
Allow the carrots to cool until warm.
Serve.
steps.description: Scoop a desired amount of garlic butter carrots onto a serving plate. Garnish with chopped parsley if desired. Enjoy!

text: Preheat the oven to 425° Fahrenheit or 218° Celsius.  Grease a baking sheet with non-stick greasing spray or brush.  Wash and diagonally slice the carrots into 2-3 inch pieces. Set aside in a large bowl. On medium heat, melt the butter on a large saucepan.  Add the garlic and saute for about 3 minutes, until golden brown.  Drizzle and toss the garlic butter over the carrots.  Pour the carrots on the baking sheet.  Bake the carrots for about 22-30 minutes, until the carrots are tender and have slightly roasted.  Season the carrots with the salt and pepper.  Allow the carrots to cool until warm.  Serve. Scoop a desired amount of garlic butter carrots onto a serving plate. Garnish with chopped parsley if desired. Enjoy!
